title: (x) Lula Magazine display type - Kursivschrift {Stephen}
content:
It is featured in the march issue of Lula magazine,

any help would be really appreciated!
author: kdiduck

comments.content: [Kursivschrift](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106105407/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/376084353/in/set-72157594511485997/), specifically the bold style, [Kursiv Stehend](http://web.archive.org/web/20091106105407/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/kursiv_stehend/?sample_text=Nothing%20is%20real%20but%20the%20girl+&sample_size=30). The ’N’ is custom.
